Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive, east of the Richland Grape Orchard.
Room.LongDescription: The large Chateau Richland Grape Orchard to the west provides much of the refreshments in the means of wine and juice to the city. The Chateau produces the finest Bordeaux wines in the land, and a bottle can run upwards of two or three gold pieces. You can hear some light cheering from the inside of the Melbourne Entertainment Arena, to the east. The entrance to the Arena is located off of Nagaritha Drive, to the south.
